
**Strategy:**

By starting high and emphasizing value, I aim to secure a good price while keeping the negotiation open. If Bob rejects the offer, I'll analyze his counteroffer and adjust my strategy accordingly, always keeping my minimum price and the option to sell to John in mind.
